summary: The “Greater Leadership Overseas for the Benefit of Equality Act of 2025” (GLOBE Act) aims to protect and enhance LGBTQI+ rights globally. It proposes actions including documenting and responding to violence, imposing sanctions on human rights violators, combating criminalization of LGBTQI+ status, providing foreign assistance, promoting global health inclusivity, reforming immigration laws related to LGBTQI+ individuals, and engaging international organizations. The bill also addresses passport issuance and citizenship for children born abroad.
